lexUnit.name: threat.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a statement of an intention to inflict injury, damage, or other hostile action as retribution.

sentence.text: There was a real threat that she might have to resign .
Police have even infiltrated crowds at major snooker tournaments to counter threats t hat the brilliant young Scot would be shot at the table .
Then she remembered Guido 's threat that he could stop him working anywhere in Italy , and suddenly she did n't feel quite so relieved any more .
